message:
The Privacy UpdateTM

To update, just press 'Yes' and it should open the installer! If it doesn't, download via the website or Discord.

This update brings enhanced privacy options, improved mod detection, new settings, and the project is now open source. These changes aim to provide a more secure and customizable experience for all users.
changelog: Enhanced privacy options: Added new settings to control data sharing and usage
Improved mod detection: Better accuracy in identifying installed and available mods
New settings: Added toggleable error logging
UI improvements: Added 'View Changelog' and 'View Credits' buttons
Open source: The project is now open source, allowing for community contributions and transparency
